name: Hotfoot Healer
description:
• SELECT YOUR SPEED! What'll it be—Slow, Normal, or Turbo?
  • SEE YA! Move and jump to avoid enemies and obstacles in your way!
  • BOOM! You can fend off enemies by swinging your gourd, too!
  • WATCH OUT! Because running into obstacles and enemies sure hurts!
  • GLUG! If you deplete all of your HP, you'll take a sip of the elixir to heal...
  • UH-OH! But if you're out of elixir and HP, that's game over!
  • CTRL + V! Complete the game to get a pastable ending card! Collect all 9!
  • LET'S GO! Play with skill and courage to set a new top score!
CONTROLS
  • D-Pad / Left Stick / WASD - Move
  • Top or Bottom Face Button / Left Shoulder / Left Trigger / K - Jump
  • Left or Right Face Button / Right Shoulder / Right Trigger / J - Attack
  • Start or Select Button / Space - Pause
KEY COMMANDS
  • Alt + Enter - Toggle between fullscreen and windowed modes
  • Alt + B - Toggle between exclusive and borderless fullscreen
  • Alt + V - Toggle vertical sync on or off
  • Alt + C - Toggle CRT shader on or off
  • Alt + F - Toggle FPS display on or off
  • Alt + 1 - Reduce windowed scaling factor
  • Alt + 2 - Increase windowed scaling factor
  • Alt + 9 - Reduce audio volume
  • Alt + 0 - Increase audio volume
